PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-00472015-01-29TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations (Interpretation and Standards 101, 105, 122 and 135)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (INTERPRETATION AND STANDARDS 101, 105, 122 AND 135) in order to increase the safety level on Canadian roads while maintaining or enhancing the level of harmonization with the United States standard and maintaining requirements for identification of vehicule controls, tell-tales and indicators by requiring internationally recognized symbols rather than words or non-uniform pictograms designed by individual manufacturers.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0024 Publication Date: 2015-02-11
AttachmentsAttachment
